title: Apple cake with cinnamon and cream cheese topping
ingredients: ['95g sugar', '84g brown sugar', '127g wholemeal flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '100ml oil or melted butter', '300g apples, grated', '3 eggs', 'For the topping', '200g cream cheese', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '104g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla sugar']
